opsNotes: Reusable motion system (logo sting, lower thirds, bumpers, transitions, end cards) packaged as editable templates + pre-renders. One brand. Source files included. Social variants (1:1, 9:16) included at Pro tier.

pricing.setupNotes: One brand; deliverables include logo sting (3–5s), lower thirds (long/short), chapter/segment bumpers, 2 transitions, 2–3 end cards, 16:9 + social variants (1:1, 9:16), template pack + pre-renders.

discountPolicy.volume: 10% off when purchased with Explainer Video Starter or Product Demo Templates in the same SOW.
discountPolicy.payment: 2% prepay discount if paid in full at kickoff.

tieredOptions.name: Starter
tieredOptions.summary: Core motion essentials for a single format (16:9).
tieredOptions.notes: Fastest turnaround; best for teams validating a motion system.

tieredOptions.name: Pro
tieredOptions.summary: Complete motion system with social variants and docs.

tieredOptions.name: Premium
tieredOptions.summary: Expanded variants, complex animation, and enhanced handover.
includesDelta: Advanced logo sting (complex 2D or light 3D look)
tieredOptions.notes: Best for high-volume content teams and event/stream usage.

assumptions: Client provides a current brand kit (logo vectors, color tokens, typography) before kickoff.
Client confirms preferred NLE (Premiere/Resolve/FCP) and version.
CTA copy/URLs and social handles are provided prior to build.
One consolidated feedback round per milestone (style frames, first preview).
Music licensing is out-of-scope; pack includes simple SFX only.

inScope: Lower thirds (long/short variants) with safe areas
Template pack for chosen NLE + pre-renders (MOV/PNG sequences)
outOfScope: Character animation or fully rigged 3D scenes
Live-action capture or editing of client footage
Music licensing or composition (available as add-on)

top: Delayed approvals on style frames can push timeline.
Brand kit inconsistencies (missing fonts/logo variants) may cause rework.
NLE mismatch (client version older than ours) can require back-ports.
mitigations: Lock review windows and approvers in kickoff.
Run a brand asset audit at day 1 and request missing items immediately.
Deliver both project files and pre-renders to ensure compatibility.

slas.handover: Within 2 business days after final approval

targets.assetReuseRate: >= 75% of videos using motion pack within 60 days

legal.usageRights: Perpetual, worldwide use for the client; no resale of templates outside the client organization.
legal.thirdParty: Client is responsible for any third-party font or music licenses.
